headline: US Stock Futures Soar as Dip Buyers Emerge After Selloff
summary: (Bloomberg) -- US stocks rallied in premarket trading after a three-day selloff that wiped out more than $5 trillion of value in US equities. headline: 3 S&P 500 Stocks Walking a Fine Line
summary: While the S&P 500 includes industry leaders, not every stock in the index is a winner. Some companies are past their prime, weighed down by poor execution, weak financials, or structural headwinds.
